The claim is based on a story posted on: com, which reported that the Federal Bureau of Investigations (FBI) has information that Russia has blackmail material on Utah Republican Rep. Jason Chaffetz.
The article cites a tweet by former Brit: who claims to have inside sources that confirm the existence of this blackmail material.
